message: This floor is nothing at all like the ballroom. It's just a cold, white hallway, absent decor.
I have to keep moving―guards could still be on my tail―but my headache keeps getting worse.
I can't think straight. I took my pills. Why isn't it getting better?
I pull the bottle from my bag, tilt my head back, and pour.
A few spill out of my mouth to the floor.
It's probably a bad idea to take so many at once, but all I can think about is making my headache stop.
I drop the empty case back into my bag and slowly make my way down the hall.
Ragged breaths spill from my lips as I stagger along. My vision is blurry and my throat is as dry as a desert.
If they find me now, I doubt I could escape... still, I focus all my strength on pushing forward.
After dragging myself a fair way down the hall, I hear a door opening ahead of me.
Shit! I can't let myself get caught now!
Not after I've gotten this far...

name: 白蒼葉
message: "I'll give you freedom from life. Freedom through destruction. I'll crush your mind, your memories, everything you are."
